Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……ゴルドバの日には、初代国王の 即位記念日の他に、何か意味はないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>, besides being the anniversary of the first king's ascension, is there any significance to the Day of Goldba?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、特になかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I don't think there is, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ううむ、ゴルドバか……確か、ゴルドバの月 というものがあったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Goldba... Well, there is something called the Moon of Goldba...

Entry.JapaneseText: 王家に代々伝わるという守護石だ。 だが、詳しい事は王家の者以外には……
Entry.EnglishText: It's the guardian stone that has been passed down through the royal family for generations. However, no one outside of the royalty knows much about it...
Entry.Notes: Needs these two sentences split up, needs reprogram. goes off screen. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ゴルドバの日に、ゴルドバの月…… ああっ、ダメだ……わかんねえ……！
Entry.EnglishText: The Day of Goldba, the Moon of Goldba... Ack... It's no good, I don't get it!
